TEXT.TITLE: SHAREDATA <SDIC> TO GET FINANCING
TEXT.BODY: Sharedata Inc said it signed a letter of intent with an investment banking firm for financing up to 2,500,000 dlrs. In return, the investment banking firm will be entitled to name a member of Sharedata's board of directors, the company said. It added it must seek the authority of its shareholders for a one-for-four reverse split of its common stock. Reuter
